org.jhove2.core.source
Class SourceCounter

java.lang.Object
  org.jhove2.core.reportable.AbstractReportable
      org.jhove2.core.source.SourceCounter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Reportable
@Persistent
public class SourceCounter
extends AbstractReportable

Convenvience class for tallying the number and kind of sources processed by JHOVE2 engine.

Author:
mstrong, slabrams, smorrissey

                    value="Number of bytestream source units processed.")
